CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1949, pg. 13 reads: "Bishop Shaw And Conference Leaders - Bishop A.P. Shaw and a group of his district leaders, snapped at the annual session in Pittsburgh last week. Shown here, left to right, are: The Rev. D.M. Pleasants, district superintendent, Virginia-Washington District; Mrs. G.E. Davis, South Baltimore District; Mrs. F.J .Frye, chairman, Board of Stewards of Washington Conference; the Rev. R.H .Johnson, district superintendent, Washington District; Mrs. R.H. Johnson; the Rev. M.F. Hayling, superintendent Charleston district; Mrs. A.P. Shaw, Mrs. M.F. Hayling, Mrs. Fannie D. Tyler, the Rev. F.F. King, superintendent, North Baltimore District; Mrs. F.F. King, and the Rev. K.P. Barnes, secretary of Conference Board of Stewards. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Methodist district leaders, from left: Rev. D. M. Pleasants, Mrs. G. E. Davis, Mrs. F. J. Frye, Rev. R. H. Johnson, Mrs. Johnson, Rev. M. F. Hayling, Mrs. A. P. Shaw, Mrs. M. F. Hayling, Fannie D. Tyler, Rev. and Mrs. F. F. King, and Rev. K. P. Barnes, posed in Warren Methodist Church for Washington Annual Conference
